name: Untethered!
description:
Epic MegaJam 2022 Submission (As Above, So Below).

Description:
Fun action game where you have to maintain the tether between the real and the ethereal world. Use your Tether ability to rebind lost souls to their bodies in order to maintain the harmony between the living and the dead.

Controls (Keyboard / Gamepad)
Movement - WASD / Left Stick
Run - Shift / Left Bumper
Jump - Spacebar / A
Attack - Enter / X
Tether - Shift / Right Trigger
Rotate Camera - Arrow Keys / Right Stick
